#summary Inner and outer returns.
#labels _
<wiki:toc/>

== Introduction ===
Snow renames the return keyword to `<-` and introduces `<--` as an inner return that works inside all control structures.

== Matrix ==
<table border="1" cellpadding="5">
    <tr>
        <td><strong>Snow</strong></td>
        <td><strong>PHP</strong></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td><- some_var</td>
        <td>return $some_var</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
    <td valign="top" cellpadding="0">
<code language="php">fn double(int n): <- n ∗ n</code>
    </td><td valign="top" cellpadding="0">
<code language="php">function double($n) {
    return $n ∗ $n;
}</code>
        </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
    <td valign="top" cellpadding="0">
<code language="php">a = if b > 3
    <-- 42
else
    <-- 666</code>
    </td><td valign="top" cellpadding="0">
<code language="php">if ($b > 3) {
    $a = 42;
} else {
    $a = 666;
}</code>
        </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
    <td valign="top" cellpadding="0">
<code language="php"><- if b > 3
    <-- 42
else
    <-- 666</code>
    </td><td valign="top" cellpadding="0">
<code language="php">if ($b > 3) {
    return 42;
} else {
    return 666;
}</code>
        </td>
    </tr>
